subcommands.name: start
subcommands.description: Start the Teleport Interaction, requires fireworks.

subcommands.name: pra
subcommands.description: Set an origin and destination. Creates a return portal. Teleport to a specific elevation.

options.name: force
options.description: Forceful or graceful teleport

options.name: xpos
options.description: Destination X Pos

options.name: ypos
options.description: Destination Elevation

options.name: zpos
options.description: Destination Z Pos

options.name: origin-x
options.description: X coordinate of origin (skip fireworks if provided)

options.name: origin-y
options.description: Y (Elevation) coordinate of origin (optional, default: 0)

options.name: origin-z
options.description: Z coordinate of origin (skip fireworks if provided)

options.name: size
options.description: Used to make a bigger zone to teleport more people.

options.name: name
options.description: Name for the PRA zone

options.name: duration
options.description: Duration in minutes for the PRA to remain active. Default will auto-expire after subsequent restart.

subcommands.name: pox
subcommands.description: Set an origin and destination. No return portal. Useful when you dont know destination elevation.

options.name: force
options.description: Forceful or graceful teleport

options.name: xpos
options.description: Destination X Pos

options.name: ypos
options.description: Destination Y Pos

options.name: origin-x
options.description: X coordinate of origin (skip fireworks if provided)

options.name: origin-y
options.description: Y (Elevation) coordinate of origin (optional, default: 0)

options.name: origin-z
options.description: Z coordinate of origin (skip fireworks if provided)

options.name: size
options.description: Used to make a bigger zone to teleport more people. 1-10

options.description: Time, in minutes, this item will remain on the server after placement. -1 = forever.

options.description: The author of the asset, optional.

options.description: URL of the image to be displayed of the item, optional. Should end in .png or .jpg
